mapper.insert: insert into w_umember (no , noise, parking, cloth, photo, prov, meeting, meal, sound, drink, smoking, hotel, valet, parking_guide, bus, wifi, chair_table, history, sale, pitting_time, pitting_num, props, type, use_time, recital, addr, addr_detail, reg_date) values (seq_t_reply_no.nextval , #{noise}, #{parking}, #{cloth}, #{photo}, #{prov}, #{meeting}, #{meal}, #{sound}, #{drink}, #{smoking}, #{hotel}, #{valet}, #{parking_guide}, #{bus}, #{wifi}, #{chair_table}, #{history}, #{sale}, #{pitting_time}, #{pitting_num}, #{props}, #{type}, #{use_time}, #{recital}, #{addr}, #{addr_detail}, to_char(reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as reg_date)
